languages.text: "Что ж..." {n}Из голоса Кибеллы пропадает жизнь — девушка звучит словно сервитор с сохранным речевым аппаратом, бубнящий записанную фразу.{/n} "Я твоя тень, и твой клинок, и твой щит. Но я более... не твоя".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж..." {n}Из голоса Кибеллы пропадает вся жизнь — культистка звучит словно сервитор с сохранным речевым аппаратом, бубнящий записанную фразу.{/n} "Я твоя тень, и твой клинок, и твой щит. Но я более... не твоя".

languages.text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."
languages.original_text: "Что ж..." {n}Из голоса Кибеллы пропадает жизнь — девушка звучит словно сервитор с сохранным речевым аппаратом, бубнящий записанную фразу.{/n} "Я твоя тень, и твой клинок, и твой щит. Но я более... не твоя".

traits.locale_text: "Well..." {n}All life seeps away from Kibellah's voice. She might as well be a servitor with its articulation preserved repeating a message.{/n} "I am your shield, and shadow, and blade. But... I am yours no more."

"Well..." {n}All life seeps away from Kibellah's voice. She might as well be a servitor with its articulation preserved repeating a message.{/n} "I am your shield, and shadow, and blade. But... I am yours no more."

"Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

"Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

"Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

"Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

languages.text: «Entonces...». {n}La vida parece abandonar la voz de Kibellah. Habla prácticamente como un servidor que, con el aparato fonador intacto, repitiese un antiguo mensaje grabado.{/n} «Seguiré siendo su escudo, su sombra, su espada. Pero... ya no soy suya».
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces...». {n}La vida parece abandonar la voz de Kibellah. Habla prácticamente como un servidor que, con el aparato fonador intacto, repitiese un antiguo mensaje grabado.{/n} «Seguiré siendo su escudo, su sombra, su espada. Pero... ya no soy suya».

languages.text: 「そうね…」{n}キベラの声からすべての生気が失われていくようだ。音声装置はそのままに、録音された古い録音音声を繰り返すサーヴィターのようだ。{/n}「私はあなたの盾で、影で、刃であり続ける。けれど…もはやあなたのものではない」
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

traits.locale_text: 「そうね…」{n}キベラの声からすべての生気が失われていくようだ。音声装置はそのままに、録音された古い録音音声を繰り返すサーヴィターのようだ。{/n}「私はあなたの盾で、影で、刃であり続ける。けれど…もはやあなたのものではない」

languages.text: “好吧……”{n}绮贝菈的声音失去了所有生命的气息，听起来与机仆没有任何区别。尽管语言装置仍然完好无损，但只会不断重复着老旧的录音信息。{/n}“我依然是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃，然而……我的人已经不再属于你了。”
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

traits.locale_text: “好吧……”{n}绮贝菈的声音失去了所有生命的气息，听起来与机仆没有任何区别。尽管语言装置仍然完好无损，但只会不断重复着老旧的录音信息。{/n}“我依然是你的坚盾，你的影子，你的利刃，然而……我的人已经不再属于你了。”

languages.text: "Nun ..." {n}Alles Leben scheint aus Kibellahs Stimme zu verschwinden. Sie klingt für die ganze Welt wie ein Servitor mit intaktem Sprechapparat, der eine alte aufgezeichnete Nachricht wiederholt.{/n} "Ich werde Euer Schild, Euer Schatten, Eure Klinge bleiben. Aber ... ich gehöre nicht mehr Euch."
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ..." {n}Alles Leben scheint aus Kibellahs Stimme zu verschwinden. Sie klingt für die ganze Welt wie ein Servitor mit intaktem Sprechapparat, der eine alte aufgezeichnete Nachricht wiederholt.{/n} "Ich werde Euer Schild, Euer Schatten, Eure Klinge bleiben. Aber ... ich gehöre nicht mehr Euch."

languages.text: « Eh bien... » {n}La voix de Kibellah se vide subitement de toute substance. Elle s'exprime de façon machinale, à la manière d'un servitor dont l'émetteur vocal demeuré intact répéterait un vieux message enregistré.{/n} « Je resterai votre bouclier, votre ombre, votre lame, mais... désormais, je ne vous appartiens plus. »
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien... » {n}La voix de Kibellah se vide subitement de toute substance. Elle s'exprime de façon machinale, à la manière d'un servitor dont l'émetteur vocal demeuré intact répéterait un vieux message enregistré.{/n} « Je resterai votre bouclier, votre ombre, votre lame, mais... désormais, je ne vous appartiens plus. »

languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."

languages.text: "Yani..." {n}Kibellah'nın sesindeki tüm canlılık soluyor sanki. Konuşma aygıtı yerinde duran, eski bir mesaj kaydını tekrarlayan bir hizmetörü andırıyor.{/n} "Yine de kalkanın, gölgen, kılıcın olacağım. Ancak... Artık senin olmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Well..." {n}All life seems to drain from Kibellah's voice. She sounds for all the world like a servitor, its speech apparatus still intact, repeating an old recorded message.{/n} "I will remain your shield, your shadow, your blade. But... I am yours no more."
